original_text: When the queen of Sheba saw the wisdom of Solomon, as well as the palace he had built,
korean_text: 스바 여왕이 솔로몬의 지혜와 그가 건축한 궁과

sentences.original_text: When the queen of Sheba saw the wisdom of Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 스바 여왕이 솔로몬의 지혜를 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: as well as the palace he had built
